channel.title: brandy on Cocktails collected by Daniel Mentiplay
channel.description: Recent content in brandy on Cocktails collected by Daniel Mentiplay

item.title: Between the sheets
item.description: Ingredients 30 ml brandy 30 ml rum 30 ml triple sec 20 ml lemon juice orange twist Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with orange twist.

item.title: Brandy crusta
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml brandy 15 ml triple sec 15 ml lemon juice 10 ml Maraschino liqueur 4 dashes aromatic bitters sugar lemon twist Instructions Sugar rim a cocktail glass. Shake ingredients (Maraschino optional). Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish with long lemon twist lining the inside of the glass.

item.title: Saratoga
item.description: Ingredients 30 ml brandy 30 ml rye whisky or bourbon 30 ml sweet vermouth 2 dashes aromatic bitters orange twist Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist.

item.title: Sidecar
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml brandy 30 ml triple sec 15 ml lemon juice orange twist Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

item.title: Vieux Carré
item.description: Ingredients 22.5 ml rye whiskey 22.5 ml brandy 22.5 ml sweet vermouth 10 ml Bénédictine liqueur 2 dashes creole bitters 2 dash aromatic bitters lemon twist Instructions Stirred. Serve in a rocks glass without ice. Garnish with a lemon twist.
